title: What are the concepts of management? - Quora

response.answer_text: The term management has been interpreted in several ways some of which are given below 1.Management as an activity · Interpersonal activities · Decisional activities · Informative activities 2.Management as a Process · Social Process · Integrated Process · Continuous Process · Interactive process 3.Management as an economic resource 4.Management as a Team 5.Management as an Academic Discipline 6.Management as a Group
